channel.title: How to play the Hornet Gun/Hivehand animation?
channel.description:
So, in the tripmine part of Surface Tension (map file is [i]bm_c2a5[/i][i]e[/i]) the player gets the Hivehand, and there's a funny animation playing with a guard's reaction to it.
[b]Guard's reaction is triggered choreography, however, I don't know how to trigger the player/Hivehand animation. If I just put it in a level, there's no special pick-up animation.[/b]
On the [i]bm_c2a5e[/i] level, this is what I found, but doesn't solve my issue at all (or I'm too blind to see the solution): [img]https://i.imgur.com/8qv4wCF.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/3zWxh74.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/fr1Ql04.png[/img]
I've noticed that there's a target entity called [i]c2a5e_hivehand_pickup[/i], but I don't know what it is; seems to be invalid.
